name: Egyptian Emeralds
description:
Made for the Secret Santa 2020 Game Jam.

Art by BlueLynx (mostly)

Explore the beginning of an Ancient Egyptian world, searching for gems and jewels.  It was going to be an RPG where you raid tombs and solve puzzles to get treasure for the villagers, however I could not finish it. If it is worth continuing, let me know!

NOTE: There is no end to the game but please feel free to explore
